changelog.md.des confs migrés (elles auront pas de se: migrated confs (they will have no properties section but only a command section) here the conf can work perfectly (but generally I pass them in properties to improve them and for better monitoring), they can have some bad commands, or they may not be good

changelog.md.Si vous regardez le changelog vous verre: If you look at the changelog you will see the number of confs that can be done (indeed this new plugin has been designed to be able to do them faster

index.md.le contrôle total du protocole domotique: full control of the Z-Wave home automation protocol in Jeedom
index.md.en se basant sur le travail effectué aut: based on the work carried out around the very famous library
index.md.Le plugin Z-wave JS fiabilise et sécuris: The Z-wave JS plugin makes transmissions more reliable and secure by using the
index.md.offrant, par la même occasion, des possi: offering, at the same time, advanced management possibilities of their Z-Wave network to the most expert users
index.md.Ce plugin est compatible Debian 11 \"Bul: This plugin is compatible with Debian 11 "Bullseye" and is therefore the official plugin to be preferred to manage your Z-Wave network in Jeedom
index.md.Après installation et activation du plug: After installing and activating the plugin, the installation of dependencies should start unless automatic management has been disabled beforehand
index.md.Dans ce cas, il faudra cliquer sur le bo: In this case, you will have to click on the button
index.md.faisant partie des dépendances nécessair: being part of the necessary dependencies, it will be automatically installed and activated during the operation if it is not already the case
index.md.Le reste des dépendances consiste au tél: The rest of the dependencies consist of downloading, compiling and configuring the library
index.md.La première installation des dépendances: The first installation of dependencies including a compilation phase, it is likely to last several tens of minutes depending on your hardware configuration
index.md.Les mises à jour des dépendances sont bi: Dependency updates are much faster to install afterwards
index.md.Concernant la configuration du plugin, l: Regarding the configuration of the plugin, the essential point is the correct selection of the
index.md.correspondant à l'interface physique sur: corresponding to the physical interface on which the controller is connected
index.md.applique directement le jeu de configura: directly applies the configuration set recommended by the Jeedom team when including a new module
index.md.permet de supprimer automatiquement les: automatically removes devices excluded from the Z-Wave network if checked
index.md.Sinon, les équipements sont conservés da: Otherwise, the equipment is kept in Jeedom even if it has been excluded from the network
index.md.L'équipement devra être alors supprimé m: The equipment will then have to be deleted manually or reused by assigning it a new Z-Wave identifier
index.md.permet de spécifier le préfixe à utilise: allows to specify the prefix to use in MQTT
index.md.Les clés de sécurité sont à conserver pr: Security keys must be kept in a safe place
index.md.Si vous perdez ces clés, les périphériqu: If you lose these keys, devices included in secure mode will need to be paired again
index.md.Les clés peuvent être spécifiées, si les: The keys can be specified, if the fields are empty or invalid the plugin will generate them and you can view them later
index.md.Si votre contrôleur a été utilisé avec l: If your controller was used with the Openzwave plugin and you had included modules in secure mode, the S0 key is
index.md.Comme expliqué en préambule, le plugin Z: As explained in the preamble, the Z-Wave JS plugin requires support for the MQTT protocol to communicate, the official plugin
index.md.va donc servir de support à ces communic: will therefore serve as a support for these communications
index.md.Vous n'utilisez pas encore de broker MQT: You are not yet using an MQTT broker
index.md.un broker `Mosquitto` sera notamment ins: a `Mosquitto` broker will be installed locally on the machine
index.md.Dans ce cas vous n'avez rien à faire: In this case you have nothing to do
index.md.vont échanger les informations et config: will exchange the necessary information and configurations automatically
index.md.Vous utilisez déjà le plugin MQTT Manage: You are already using the MQTT Manager plugin
index.md.Aucune intervention n'est nécessaire, le: No intervention is necessary, the Z-Wave JS plugin will automatically retrieve the connection information to the MQTT broker
index.md.Vous utilisez déjà un broker MQTT via un: You are already using an MQTT broker via a plugin other than MQTT Manager
index.md.Dans cette situation, il faut sélectionn: In this situation, you must select the mode
index.md.dans la configuration du plugin MQTT Man: in the MQTT Manager plugin configuration
index.md.Vous souhaitez utiliser un broker MQTT s: You want to use an MQTT broker under Docker
index.md.Il suffit alors de sélectionner le mode: All you have to do is select the mode
index.md.dans la configuration du plugin MQTT Man: in MQTT Manager plugin configuration before installing `Mosquitto`
index.md.Dans tous les cas, le démon du plugin MQ: In any case, the MQTT Manager plugin daemon must be started before you can move on
index.md.Autrement un message vous avertira, empê: Otherwise a message will warn you, preventing the start of the Z-Wave JS daemon
index.md.Il est également important d'aborder le: It is also important to address the case of the presence of the OpenZwave plugin in parallel with the Z-Wave JS plugin, the time to switch from one to the other for example *(See paragraph
index.md.Tout d'abord, il faut savoir qu'il n'exi: First of all, you should know that there is absolutely no risk in using the Z-Wave JS and OpenZwave plugins in parallel
index.md.Même en cas de difficulté avec le plugin: Even in case of difficulty with the Z-Wave JS plugin, it will suffice to stop its daemon and restart that of the OpenZwave plugin to find an exactly identical and functional Z-Wave network
index.md.Il faut donc arrêter la gestion automati: It is therefore necessary to stop the automatic management then stop the OpenZwave plugin daemon to be able to start the Z-Wave JS plugin daemon. Again, if not, a message will warn you, preventing the start of the Z-Wave JS daemon
index.md.Ne supprimez aucun équipement du plugin: Do not delete any equipment from the OpenZwave plugin prematurely even if it is disabled during testing
index.md.Sauf message contraire, le démon Z-Wave: Unless otherwise instructed, the Z-Wave JS daemon can now be started
index.md.Sinon, un message doit s'afficher sur la: Otherwise, a message should appear on the plugin configuration page to identify the reason for the blockage
index.md.Si vous utilisez le plugin Z-Wave JS ave: If you use the Z-Wave JS plugin with a blank controller, the Z-Wave network is immediately started and available, ready for module inclusions
index.md.Dans le cas d'une utilisation avec un co: In the case of use with a controller already included in a Z-Wave network, the plugin must be left to work, which will automatically upload the equipment in Jeedom as the modules are interviewed
index.md.La première découverte totale d'un résea: The first total discovery of a Z-Wave network is therefore likely to take a long time depending on the type of modules used and their communication frequency
index.md.Les modules font leur apparition en deux: The modules appear in two stages
index.md.Tout d'abord avec leur `node id` sans im: First with their `node id` without image and without identification
index.md.Ils sont ensuite identifiés dans un seco: They are then identified in a second time
index.md.Une fois que tous les modules sur secteu: Once all the modules on mains are initiated and therefore identified, it is important to wake up the modules on batteries or wait for them to wake up
index.md.Ce n'est qu'à partir de ce moment que l': It is only from this moment that we can consider the network as being fully started
index.md.Contrairement au plugin OpenZwave, après: Unlike the OpenZwave plugin, after this first interview phase, network restarts are instantaneous thereafter
index.md.qui peut être longue rappelons-le: which can be long let's remember
index.md.Si, à l'issue de cette phase: If, at the end of this phase

index.md.Contrairement au plugin Openzwave, il n': Unlike the Openzwave plugin, there is no dedicated section for configuring modules
index.md.En effet la configuration d'un module es: Indeed the configuration of a module is made through the command class Configuration

index.md.Cette étape peut facilement prendre plus: This step can easily take several days to validate all the possibilities and scenarios
